anya-e0105n22:1_0: Kasmā pana te taṁ āyāciṁsūti? Vuccate,
anya-e0105n22:1_1: mahāvihāravāsino hi āditoyeva paṭṭhāya piṭakattayaṁ yathā tīsu saṅgītīsu pāḷibhāsāya saṅgītaṁ,
anya-e0105n22:1_4: tathā porāṇaṁ pāḷipiṭakameva uggaṇhanti ceva vācenti ca,
anya-e0105n22:1_8: 0) pacchā sīhaḷikattherānañceva aññesañca vatthu na dissati ṭhapetvā mahāsenarājavatthuṁ pārā. aṭṭha. 2.236- 237,
anya-e0105n22:1_9: yāva ācariyabuddhaghosakālāpi ca tā eva porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo atthi na abhinavīkatā.
anya-e0105n22:1_10: Tena tesaṁ piṭakesu yebhuyyena janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ asañjātābhilāsā honti asañjātussāhā.
anya-e0105n22:1_11: Dīpantaresu ca attano piṭakaṁ pattharāpetuṁ na sakkonti aṭṭhakathānaṁ dīpabhāsāya abhisaṅkhatattā.
anya-e0105n22:1_12: Abhayagirivāsino pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakālato paṭṭhāya sakkatabhāsāropitaṁ dhammarucinikāyādipiṭakampi
anya-e0105n22:1_13: mahāyānapiṭakampi navaṁ navaṁ pariyāpuṇanti ceva vācenti ca,
anya-e0105n22:1_14: tena tesaṁ piṭakesu yebhuyyena janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ sañjātābhilāsā honti sañjātussāhā,
anya-e0105n22:1_16: Tatoyeva te dīpantaresupi attano vādaṁ pattharāpetuṁ sakkonti.
anya-e0105n22:1_17: Tasmā te mahāvihāravāsino therā attano sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo pāḷibhāsāya abhisaṅkharitukāmā tathā kātuṁ samatthaṁ
anya-e0105n22:1_18: ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ñāṇappabhāvavisesaṁ yathāvuttaguṇasampannabhāvañca ñatvā āyāciṁsūti veditabbaṁ.
